author: robocopsgonemad
content: I don't think we will be able to have a good quality list in time. We could get *something* put together, but with 40 EIPs, many of which need to be considered as permutations for scheduling, the quality would be low.

author: robocopsgonemad
content: We're requesting to push this one more ACDE cycle.

author: ralexstokes
content:
as a general message for everyone, was talking with <@415548822983278593>  about the best way to approach and i think we will do the following for the glam scoping segment of thursday's call
* each client team has an opportunity to present a high-level (< 1 min) overview of any EIPs they strongly support
* we go through all EL EIPs and try to gain consensus on a DFI candidate list (and after doing this and previous point we may also get some sense of a CFI candidate list)

this should give everyone more info to make a 2nd pass to refine their team's selections for the next ACDE where we can continue the conversation

author: ralexstokes
content: i hope we have enough info to start making confirmed selections on the EL side on the 20 Nov call
